block.field: Move robot a set distance and stop. Continue to next block once robot reaches it's target.
Start robot moving while continuing to next block.
Sets the speed of the robot. The speed range is 0 - 100%.
Turn the robot for number of degrees in a spinning motion about it's center.
Turn the robot left or right for number of degrees by pivoting on one wheel.

Start moving forward with a steering ratio. The robot will drive in an arc by setting a speed ratio for the left and right motors. The arc will be sharper with larger ratios. Speed range for each motor is 0 - 100.
Wait here until robot's start button is pressed.
Read the state of the green button. Returns true if condition is met.
Read the state of the black button. Returns true if condition is met.
Read the distance to an object in centimeters returned by the ultrasonic sensor.
Read the value returned by the reflected lighter sensor.
Move servo motors to a position at a speed. Position is 0-180, speed is 0 - 100%.
Set the pixel to a color and set the brightness.
Play a tone at a frequency in Hz.
Show an animation pattern for number of seconds
Blink the pixels(s) with a color 'x' number of times
repeat statements in do loop forever
